title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.9 - Traffic control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.9 - Traffic control

State Regulations
(a) Parking is prohibited on or along both sides of all highways on the grounds of
the State University College at Oswego, City and Town of Oswego, Oswego

County. (b) 20 MPH is established
as the maximum speed limit at which vehicles may proceed on highways on the
grounds of the State University College at Oswego, City and Town of Oswego, Oswego County. (c) Yield
intersections. The following intersections on the grounds of the State

University College at Oswego, City and Town of Oswego, Oswego County, are

(e) One-way traffic. The following roadway on the grounds of the State

University College at Oswego, City and Town of Oswego, Oswego County, is
designated for one-way traffic: (1)

Onondaga Hall Drive between Seneca Hall Drive and Onondaga Hall Drive Circle
for traffic proceeding in a southerly direction only. (2)

Johnson Hall Drive off Rudolph Road for
traffic proceeding north and west only. Notes

583.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
